item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德旗下CDK集团利润下滑18%，软件业务担忧加剧
item.description: 由布鲁克菲尔德商业伙伴公司支持的CDK Global公司报告称，其第四季度盈利出现两位数下滑，这表明该公司正面临困境，而华尔街正密切关注软件行业如何应对人工智能的进步。【原文：Brookfield Business Partners-backed CDK Global reported a double-digit earnings decline in the fourth quarter, a sign of struggles at the company right as Wall Street scrutinizes how the software sector will hold up against advancements in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 安联计划回购价值高达25亿欧元的股份
item.description: 德国保险巨头安联集团宣布将实施更多股票回购计划，该公司旗下债券投资机构太平洋投资管理公司（PIMCO）的首席执行官奥利弗·贝特正将超额现金返还给投资者。【原文：Allianz SE, the German insurer which owns bond investor Pacific Investment Management Co., announced more share repurchases as Chief Executive Officer Oliver Baete returns excess cash to investors.】

item.title: 美国数据中心建设因审批延误和电力供应问题而放缓
item.description: 尽管对人工智能计算能力的需求激增，美国新建数据中心的数量自2020年以来首次出现下滑，原因是开发商在审批许可、区域规划和电力采购方面遭遇延误。【原文：Construction of new data centers in the US fell for the first time since 2020 despite soaring demand for artificial intelligence computing capacity, as developers face delays in permitting, zoning and power procurement.】

item.title: 巴克莱称美国公司债券市场竞争空前激烈
item.description: 巴克莱银行表示，美国公司债券的强劲需求已使一级市场出现有史以来最激烈的竞争局面，同时也在推动二级市场交易量增长。【原文：Strong demand for US corporate bonds has created the most competitive conditions on record across primary markets, and is spurring more trading in the secondary market too, according to Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 三星发布Galaxy S26 Ultra：隐私屏、轻量化设计与更强AI功能
item.description: 三星电子公司发布了Galaxy S26系列智能手机，重点在于人工智能功能和现实世界中的隐私保护，而非重大设计变革。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. unveiled its Galaxy S26 lineup of smartphones, with an emphasis on artificial intelligence features and real-world privacy over major design changes.】

item.title: 住房类股票因前景黯淡及特朗普冷落而重挫
item.description: 周三，受美国住房市场影响的股票大幅下挫。投资者正评估家居建材零售商劳氏公司等企业发布的黯淡前景，同时权衡特朗普总统在国情咨文演讲中未更新住房政策的影响。【原文：Stocks exposed to the US housing market plummeted Wednesday as investors assessed grim outlooks from companies like home improvement retailer Lowe’s Cos Inc., and weighed the lack of a housing policy update during President Donald Trump’s State of the Union speech.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯、伊朗提升石油出口量，中东局势持续紧张
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯和伊朗正加速石油出口，向全球市场增供原油。与此同时，美国在中东部署军事资产，使未来供应前景充满不确定性。【原文：Saudi Arabia and Iran are both accelerating oil exports, adding barrels to global markets at a time when the US is deploying military assets in the Middle East, creating uncertainty about future supply.】

item.title: 科勒资本以4.77亿美元收购新山资本旗下商业发展公司资产
item.description: 二级市场投资机构Coller Capital同意以4.77亿美元收购New Mountain Finance Corp.的资产，这家私募信贷基金此举旨在增强其财务灵活性。【原文：Coller Capital, a secondaries firm, agreed to buy $477 million of assets from New Mountain Finance Corp. as the private credit fund looked to boost its financial flexibility.】

item.title: 阿联酋全球铝业在市场紧缩期间提升对美销售量
item.description: 阿联酋最大的铝生产商阿联酋环球铝业公司正加大对美国的出口力度，尽管面临高额关税，但日益严重的供应短缺已将美国铝价推升至足以抵消关税的水平。【原文：Emirates Global Aluminium, the United Arab Emirates’ top producer of the metal, is boosting shipments to the US despite stiff tariffs, as growing shortages drive American prices to levels that offset the levies.】

item.title: Thrive的买入并持有策略使早期基金价值增长六倍
item.description: 文件显示，作为硅谷多家最成功企业的风险投资方，Thrive Capital旗下投资组合公司的价值在过去15年间大幅飙升，其2011年设立的基金近期增值近六倍。【原文：Thrive Capital, a venture investor in some of Silicon Valley’s most successful businesses, has seen the value of its portfolio companies surge over the past 15 years, with its 2011 fund recently increasing nearly sixfold, documents show.】

item.title: 欧盟认为美国关税突破协议限制，涉及42亿欧元商品
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普的新关税计划将导致约42亿欧元（50亿美元）的欧盟出口商品面临高于欧盟-美国贸易协定中商定的15%上限的关税。【原文：President Donald Trump’s new tariff program will leave about €4.2 billion ($5 billion) of European Union exports facing levies above the 15% ceiling agreed in the EU-US trade accord.】

item.title: 西班牙住房危机使占屋者与业主对立
item.description:
随着西班牙房地产市场达到临界点，数万处被占用的房产正待售。

【原文：

Decenas de miles de propiedades ocupadas están a la venta mientras el mercado inmobiliario español alcanza un punto crítico.

】

item.title: 国家支持的黑客如何绕过伊朗的互联网封锁
item.description: 伊朗对以色列的网络攻击在长达数周的互联网中断期间持续不断。【原文：Iranian cyberattacks on Israel continued throughout the weeks’ long internet blackout.】

item.title: 欧洲央行宽松货币政策的主要设计者将提前退休
item.description: 欧洲央行货币政策部门的一位首席工程师即将提前离职，此次关键性管理层变动正值该行高层架构即将重整之际。【原文：A leading engineer of the European Central Bank’s monetary policy is set to leave early in a pivotal management change that coincides with the looming revamp of its top echelon.】

item.title: 摩根大通、美银看好委内瑞拉债券 因其未付利息更多
item.description: 摩根大通和美国银行的策略师正敦促客户买入委内瑞拉全球债券，这些债券存在大量未付利息。他们押注这些债券在潜在债务重组前可能跑赢大盘。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Bank of America strategists are urging clients to buy Venezuelan global bonds with large piles of unpaid interest, betting they could outperform ahead of a potential debt restructuring.】

item.title: 北海原油价格走弱，维托尔与道达尔的采购狂潮告终
item.description: 北海原油市场正显露疲软迹象，维托集团和道达尔能源的大规模买盘已趋于平缓，这恰逢更多供应即将回归大西洋盆地之际，市场支撑的关键支柱随之消失。【原文：The North Sea crude market is flashing signs of weakness as heavy buying from Vitol Group and TotalEnergies SE subsides, removing a key pillar of support just as more supply is set to return to the Atlantic Basin.】

item.title: 沙特石油出口量飙升至三年高位，伊朗局势持续紧张
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯本月出口量有望创下近三年来最高纪录，在原油交易商密切关注美伊紧张局势之际，为全球市场输送石油。【原文：Saudi Arabia is on course to ship the most oil from its ports in almost three years this month, bringing supply to the global market at a time when crude traders are monitoring US-Iran tensions.】

item.title: 美国为南方公司公用事业公司完成265亿美元融资
item.description: 特朗普政府周三宣布，已为南方公司旗下两家子公司完成总额265亿美元的贷款方案，用于资助佐治亚州和阿拉巴马州的新天然气及水电项目。【原文：The Trump administration announced Wednesday it had closed a $26.5 billion loan package for two Southern Company subsidiaries to finance new gas and hydropower projects in Georgia and Alabama.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚在财政压力下瞄准67亿美元养老金资产
item.description: 哥伦比亚正准备出台一项法规，将数以十亿计的私人养老金储蓄转移至公共退休体系。此举有望缓解资金缺口问题，该问题正加剧该国的财政压力。【原文：Colombia is preparing a regulation to shift billions of dollars in private pension savings to its public retirement system, a move that could help ease a funding shortfall that is adding to the nation’s fiscal strains.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉去年在美元严重短缺的情况下出售黄金
item.description: 委内瑞拉央行在去年下半年出售了近六吨黄金，当时该国因美国限制石油出口而面临严重的美元短缺问题。【原文：Venezuela’s central bank sold nearly six tons of gold in the second half of last year as the country faced crippling dollars shortages due to US restrictions on oil exports.】

item.title: 标普500指数上涨，科技股在英伟达财报发布前走高
item.description: 周三美国股市上涨，因权重最大的标普500指数成分股英伟达公司股价攀升，该芯片制造商将在盘后发布财报。【原文：US stocks gained on Wednesday as Nvidia Corp., the top-weighted S&P 500 Index stock, climbed ahead of the chipmaker’s earnings report after the market close.】

item.title: 人工智能颠覆担忧引发二级市场热潮下的严格审查
item.description: 数月来，市场担忧人工智能可能对软件巨头构成威胁，持续压低其股票估值。如今，这种担忧正悄然蔓延至私募市场。【原文：Fears that artificial intelligence may spell bad news for software giants have been pressuring stock market valuations for months. Now, those same fears are creeping into private markets too.】

item.title: 欧盟定于三月启动关税竞赛，为欧洲央行博弈铺路
item.description: 欧盟各国距离决定新海关机构的落户地点仅剩数周时间，这可能成为下一任欧洲央行行长人选竞逐中的首个焦点。【原文：European Union nations are just weeks away from a decision on where to host the bloc’s new customs agency, in what could be an initial flash point in the race to pick the next European Central Bank chief.】

item.title: 安盛投资管理称将因人工智能风险拒绝部分软件交易
item.description: 法国私募股权公司Ardian将避免对软件领域的某些投资，因该行业正面临人工智能发展带来的颠覆性挑战。【原文：French private equity firm Ardian will avoid certain types of investment in software as the sector grapples with the challenges posed by the disruption from developments in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 瑞银全球财富首席投资官称，随着人工智能蓬勃发展，应弃用程序员转而聘请建设者
item.description: 瑞银财富管理全球股票主管兼美洲首席投资官乌尔里克·霍夫曼-布尔查迪指出，人工智能对软件驱动型企业的威胁应促使投资者将关注点从科技领域转向实体经济领域的企业，例如矿业公司、电力生产商和工业企业。【原文：The threat to software-backed businesses from artificial intelligence should prompt investors to shift focus from technology to companies that toil in the physical world, like miners, power producers and industrial firms, according to Ulrike Hoffmann-Burchardi, global head of equities and chief investment officer for the Americas at UBS Wealth Management.】

item.title: 花旗集团组建专注于人工智能基础设施的银行团队
item.description: 花旗集团已组建一个专注于人工智能基础设施热潮的团队，该团队由其投资银行和公司银行团队的领导者组成。【原文：Citigroup Inc. has formed a group focused on the artificial intelligence infrastructure boom comprised of leaders from its investment banking and corporate banking teams.】

item.title: 美国压裂船队在海外重获新生，页岩油气行业持续低迷
item.description: 随着得克萨斯州、新墨西哥州及其他地区页岩油气田的增长放缓，美国水力压裂公司正越来越多地将闲置设备运往海外，在国外开拓新市场。【原文：US fracking companies are increasingly sending their idle equipment overseas, finding new markets abroad as growth slows in the shale fields of Texas, New Mexico and elsewhere.】

item.title: 黑客利用Anthropic的Claude窃取墨西哥敏感数据
item.description: 据网络安全研究人员称，一名黑客利用Anthropic PBC的人工智能聊天机器人对墨西哥政府机构实施了一系列攻击，导致大量敏感税务和选民信息被窃取。【原文：A hacker exploited Anthropic PBC’s artificial intelligence chatbot to carry out a series of attacks against Mexican government agencies, resulting in the theft of a huge trove of sensitive tax and voter information, according to cybersecurity researchers.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行博廷：效率提升推动人工智能投资增至10亿欧元
item.description: 桑坦德银行执行主席安娜·博廷正寄望于人工智能技术，以期在未来几年实现其设定的目标，预计将创造逾10亿欧元（约合12亿美元）的收益。【原文：Banco Santander SA Executive Chair Ana Botin is counting on artificial intelligence to provide more than €1 billion ($1.2 billion) to targets she’s set for the next years.】

item.title: 俄罗斯考虑下调2026年GDP预测值，因油价暴跌
item.description: 俄罗斯政府正考虑大幅下调今年的经济增长预期，因针对乌克兰战争的更严厉制裁正冲击石油收入。【原文：Russia’s government is weighing a substantial downgrade to its growth forecast for this year as tougher sanctions over the war in Ukraine hit oil revenue.】
